messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Stabby Warehouse 13. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Primate life-forms have been detected with an unknown but very infectious disease in the station, eliminate the disease before leaving the station.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: COME DOWN TO THE FUCKING BAR NOW RAGE CAGE NOOOW!!!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Simian lifeforms have been detected with an unknown disease in the station, clear up the outbreak before it spreads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our sophisticated probabilistic models, we believe that one of the station's animals/bots has developed very low level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I'M SORRY I CAN'T CHANGE ALERT I'M NOT THE CAPTAIN I JUST CAME TO RESCUE YOU

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Port Quarter Solar Maintenance.
